content: lion brand pattern # 70223a skill level intermediate level 3 vanna s choice® article #860 6 colors 19 balls total *taupe chocolate linen dusty blue olive navy* crochet hook - size j-10 6 mm gauge 14 single_crochet +18 row = 5 in 12 5 cm use a separate ball of yarn for each color section do not carry unused colors across work following chart for color changes work in single_crochet until chart has been completed crochet edging to finish crochet terms are in u s terminology
